text: select single item from a collection : Python
I created a utility function to return the expected single item from an generator expression

code: print one(name for name in ('bob','fred') if name=='bob')

text: Is this a good way to go about it?

code:
def one(g):
    try:
        val = g.next()
        try:
            g.next()
        except StopIteration:
            return val
        else:
            raise Exception('Too many values')
    except StopIteration:
        raise Exception('No values')
